definition: A term used to describe something that is worth the effort, time, or investment due to the positive outcome or benefits it brings. It is commonly used to refer to activities, experiences, or endeavors that are deemed rewarding or worthwhile.

examples.german: Es ist lohnenswert, Deutsch zu lernen.
examples.english: It is worthwhile to learn German.
The movie was really worth it.

examples.german: Es ist lohnenswert, in Bildung zu investieren.
examples.english: It is worth investing in education.

examples.german: Es ist lohnenswert, Zeit mit der Familie zu verbringen.
examples.english: It is worthwhile to spend time with family.
